English: The purpose of this website is to showcase my various projects.
These will range from Web Applications and Mobile Applications, to 3D Art and Game Development.
Norwegian: Denne nettsiden er for å vise frem diverse prosjekter jeg har jobbet med.
Disse vil være alt fra Web Applikasjoner og Mobile Applikasjoner, til 3D kunst og Spillutvikling.
Japanese: 私のサイトへようこそ。
このサイトの目的は、私の様々プロジェクトショーケース。
これらは、ウェブやモバイルアプリケーション、とスリーディーアートやゲーム開発。
Korean: The purpose of this website is to showcase my various projects.
These will range from Web Applications and Mobile Applications, to 3D Art and Game Development.
